attributes.action: Have a national enquiry into child sex abuse
attributes.additional_details: In my personal view with resent child sex exploitation cases  in Rotherham there should be a national enquiry into sex exploitation in the United Kingdom and the data kept on a national data base to tackle the problem. As I fear this is the tip of the iceberg.I'm sure my e-petition would get the backing of MPs in Westminster and we need to move forward with this problem quick.
